abstract: The trial of Rajat K. Gupta, a former director of Goldman Sachs and Procter & Gamble, began on Monday. Mr. Gutpa is accused of leaking boardroom secrets about those two companies to a friend and business associate.
snippet: The trial of Rajat K. Gupta, a former director of Goldman Sachs and Procter & Gamble, began on Monday. Mr. Gutpa is accused of leaking boardroom secrets about those two companies to a friend and business associate.
lead_paragraph: “He’s not an insider trader. He never defrauded anybody. He never cheated anybody,” said a lawyer for Rajat K. Gupta, once one of America’s most prominent businessmen. “He doesn’t belong in this courtroom.”

headline.main: Dueling Portrayals of Former Goldman Director at Insider Trading Trial

byline.original: By Peter Lattman and Azam Ahmed
